args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor Laxi's adventurer story, as well as the\nmain campaign through Chapter 14.
▷Our target is that pack of fiends.◁\nCommencing elimination.\n▷Let's clear 'em out!◁
No further targets detected.\n▷Whew! Nice work, Laxi.◁
Laxi, reporting in.\n▷We dealt with the fiends.◁
▷Yep! If anything, we finished\nsooner than we expected.◁
Hey, no complaints there! Or from you,\nMascula, now that I think of it. You good?
No, just... I mean, it hasn't been long\nsince you made up your mind to fight.
And with you being such a softy and all,\nI wasn't sure how you'd take to it.
Agreed. Do you truly intend to\ncontinue engaging in combat?
You claimed you would never fight,\nyet you do. Your words and actions\nare in paradox.
▷Well, yeah, I suppose they are.\nAnd I still don't WANT to hurt anyone.◁
▷But I've resolved to continue fighting\nuntil the day it's no longer required.◁
Respect for that—though whatever you\ndecide, know that I've got your back.
▷I appreciate it, Luca—and I know I'll\nbe even more help in the future.◁
▷Laxi and I still haven't reached\nour full potential yet.◁
You're talkin' about that crazy Eden mode\nthingie you pulled off before, yeah?\nNo luck making it work again?
Its use is available. However, the system\nstrain is significant, so application is\nlimited to short, controlled bursts.

▷If we could get it to be a bit more stable,
the strain might be more manageable—
but as of right now, we still don't even
understand how it WORKS.◁
Too bad your maestro didn't leave\nan instruction manual.
▷Yeah, I wish we had a clue.◁\n...We may.
You got an idea there, Laxi?
Affirmative. If we seek answers about\nour maestro, our destination is clear.\n▷Destination? Wait, you don't mean—◁
The ruins of his research facility.
With Zethia gone, it's gonna be chaos\nover there. You sure it's a good idea\nto go pokin' around?
We have no other means of learning about\nEden mode—and that power will certainly\nbe required in future battles.
Look, all I'm saying is that we ain't got a\nclue what's goin' on over there in the\nBEST of circumstances, much less now.
▷Well then, we'll just have to get a\nformer imperial soldier to lead the way.◁
Why should I play tour guide for some\npsychopathic widget like you?
Uh, Mascula? Who's the old dude?
▷I forgot you haven't met. Remember our\nfight with the Empire at Myriage Lake?◁
▷Well, this is one of the villagers\nwho tried to get revenge on Laxi.◁
The ones who beat the ever-loving tar out\nof you guys to try and get revenge?
Don't forget the part where we eased off!\nThat Mascula or whoever it was made\nsome decent points.
▷Heh. I was really relieved to see you\nlower your weapons.◁
Well, I didn't do it because I wanted to\nmake friends with the likes of you,\nso let's get this over with.
There, up ahead. That's the place, yeah?
Motion detected at laboratory entrance.\nRace: Human. Affiliation: Dyrenell Empire.
What do they want with a trashed lab?\nLooking for magic weapons, maybe?
Unknown. However, their numbers are\ninsufficient to deter our infiltration.\nWe will follow them inside.
Laxi, do you EVER have a lower gear?!\n...Sorry, pal. You better hang back here\nuntil we get this all sorted.
No complaints from me! Hey, but...\nbe careful, all right?
▷Those soldiers really picked it over.\nThere may not be anything left to find.◁
I am the commanding unit, so I know.\nYou are not, so you do not. Hee hee.\n▷Right, which is why I'm ASKING.◁
I know where to find the entrance\nto his hidden chamber.
▷I had no clue this place existed.◁\nEven I have never been inside.
▷Hey, Laxi! Take a look at this!◁
▷We found a new outfit for Laxi.◁
▷Its design should accommodate the\nextra armaments that materialize when\nEden mode is activated.◁
No doubt it was created for that express\npurpose as a final present from our\nmaestro. I will equip it now.
Whoa, hang on! You can't just strip down\nin the middle of—GAH!
Overruled. I will equip it now.
And I'll...uh...go stand guard outside!\nVery, VERY far outside.
▷Sorry to keep you waiting, Luca.◁ \nHow do I look? Great, yes? Excellent?
You look good, Laxi. Now if the fashion\nshow is over, let's look for more clues.
Praise enthusiasm level unacceptable.\n▷Whoa, easy, Laxi! Let's just see what\nwe can find in here, okay?◁
